meanings.definition: A place where iron is made or worked.
meanings.sent1: The old ironworks in town is now a museum showcasing the history of iron production.
meanings.sent2: The ironworks employs many skilled workers who craft various iron products.
meanings.sent3: Visiting the ironworks felt like stepping back in time to the days of blacksmiths and forges.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as the ironworks that never ceased production.
meanings.sent5: The clang of hammers and the roar of furnaces filled the air at the bustling ironworks.

meanings.definition: The industry of manufacturing iron goods.
meanings.sent1: The decline of the ironworks affected the entire economy of the region.
meanings.sent2: Many families relied on the ironworks for their livelihoods.
meanings.sent3: The ironworks industry faced tough competition from overseas manufacturers.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for ironworks products led her to start her own successful business.
meanings.sent5: The ironworks industry boomed during the industrial revolution, shaping the modern world.
